The post Rang de Basanti appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Rang de Basanti

Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a Fun event named “RANG DE BASANTI”. It was an online reel submission event. This event was conducted on 5th & 6th February 2022.

It had 45 registrations and 27 responses from participants.

Event Details –
It was a reel-making event. This event was categorized into 3 parts. The participant could make reels on any of the following categories –

  1. Kite making: – They can make handmade Kites with their unique ideas and send us a video or picture of them.
  2. Food Mania: – They can make food as per theme and click its pictures or make a video while making it.
  3. Dress up: – They can dress up as per theme and can add their pictures in reels.

The submissions were done via Google form.

item.title: Doorway to ACES
item.dc:creator: Sharanjit Singh
item.description:
Doorway to ACES Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized an interactive event named “DOORWAY TO ACES”. It was conducted on 2nd February 2022. The event was conducted on Google Meet. On the first day of the event, all the participants were called to introduce themselves and share their hobbies, goals and etc so that […]

The post Doorway to ACES appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Doorway to ACES

Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized an interactive event named “DOORWAY TO ACES”. It was conducted on 2nd February 2022. The event was conducted on Google Meet. On the first day of the event, all the participants were called to introduce themselves and share their hobbies, goals and etc so that it will reduce their public speaking fears. They also got a golden opportunity to interact with their respective seniors and teachers. Students found this event very helpful and useful as they got more to know about ACES and their branch. On the second day of the event interview session held where we select the active members for ACES. There were 64 online registrations with a total of 50 students participating in this event.

Below are the details of the event: –

DATE: 25th January 2022

The first-day ‘INTERACTION PROGRAMME’ was broken into 3 parts: –

●      Part 1- Interaction Programme from 11:00 AM to 11:30 AM

●      Part 2- Come to know about ACES from 11:30 AM to 12:15 PM

●      Part 3- Questioning and answering from 12:15 PM to 12:30 PM

●      Participants: – 50+

Date: 2nd February 2022

The second-day’ DOORWAY TO ACES’ held from 3:30 PM to 5:00 PM.

●      Participants: – 46
